definitions.definition: say something in order to obtain an answer or some information.
definitions.example: I asked her what she meant

definitions.definition: say to (someone) that one wants them to do or give something.

definitions.definition: invite (someone) to one's home or a function.

definitions.definition: in or into a state of sleep.
definitions.example: she had been asleep for over three hours

definitions.definition: a particular part or feature of something.
definitions.example: personal effectiveness in all aspects of life

definitions.definition: the positioning of a building or other structure in a particular direction.
definitions.example: a greenhouse with a southern aspect

definitions.definition: help (someone), typically by doing a share of the work.
definitions.example: a senior academic would assist him in his work

definitions.definition: an act of giving help, typically by providing money.
definitions.example: the budget must have an assist from tax policies

definitions.definition: the action of helping someone by sharing work.
definitions.example: the work was completed with the assistance of carpenters

definitions.definition: a person who ranks below a senior person.
definitions.example: the managing director and his assistant

definitions.definition: connect (someone or something) with something else in one's mind.
definitions.example: I associated wealth with freedom

definitions.definition: a person with limited or subordinate membership of an organization.

definitions.definition: Psychology
definitions.example: the patient was asked to commit to memory a list of five paired associates

definitions.definition: connected with an organization or business.
definitions.example: an associate company

definitions.definition: a partner or companion in business or at work.
definitions.example: a close associate of the Minister

definitions.definition: (of a person or thing) connected with something else.
definitions.example: two associated events

definitions.definition: connect (someone or something) with something else in one's mind.
definitions.example: I associated wealth with freedom

definitions.definition: (often in names) a group of people organized for a joint purpose.

definitions.definition: a connection or cooperative link between people or organizations.
definitions.example: he developed a close association with the university

definitions.definition: a mental connection between things.
definitions.example: the word bureaucracy has unpleasant associations

definitions.definition: the state of occurring with something else; co-occurrence.

definitions.definition: suppose to be the case, without proof.
definitions.example: topics which assume detailed knowledge of local events

definitions.definition: take or begin to have (power or responsibility).

definitions.definition: begin to have (a specified quality, appearance, or extent).

definitions.definition: tell someone something positively to dispel any doubts.

definitions.definition: make (something) certain to happen.

definitions.definition: coming before all others in time or order; earliest; 1st.

definitions.definition: foremost in position, rank, or importance.
definitions.example: the doctor's first duty is to respect this right

definitions.definition: with a specified part or person in a leading position.
definitions.example: the car plunged nose first into the river

definitions.definition: the most pressing, likely, or suitable.
definitions.example: his first problem is where to live

definitions.definition: smallest in amount, extent, or significance.
definitions.example: who has the least money?

definitions.definition: to the smallest extent or degree.

definitions.definition: the envelope of gases surrounding the earth or another planet.

definitions.definition: the smallest particle of a chemical element that can exist.
definitions.example: they build tiny circuits atom by atom

definitions.definition: join or fasten (something) to something else.
definitions.example: attach your safety line to the bridge

definitions.definition: attribute importance or value to.
definitions.example: he doesn't attach too much importance to fixed ideas

definitions.definition: take aggressive military action against (a place or enemy forces) with weapons or armed force.

definitions.definition: criticize or oppose fiercely and publicly.

definitions.definition: begin to deal with (a problem or task) in a determined and vigorous way.
definitions.example: a plan of action to attack unemployment

definitions.definition: an instance of fierce public criticism or opposition.

definitions.definition: a sudden short bout of an illness or stress.

definitions.definition: (in sport) an aggressive attempt to score a goal or point or otherwise gain an advantage.

definitions.definition: (in sport) make a forceful attempt to score a goal or point or otherwise gain an advantage against an opposing team or player.

definitions.definition: an aggressive and violent act against a person or place.
definitions.example: he was killed in an attack on a checkpoint

definitions.definition: make an effort to achieve or complete (something difficult).

definitions.definition: an effort to achieve or complete a difficult task or action.

definitions.definition: make an effort to achieve or complete (something difficult).
definitions.example: she attempted a comeback in 2001

definitions.definition: be present at (an event, meeting, or function).

definitions.definition: deal with.

definitions.definition: escort and wait on (a member of royalty or other important person).

definitions.definition: occur with or as a result of.

definitions.definition: notice taken of someone or something; the regarding of someone or something as interesting or important.

definitions.definition: the action of dealing with or taking special care of someone or something.

definitions.definition: the orientation of an aircraft or spacecraft, relative to the direction of travel.
a settled way of thinking or feeling about something.

definitions.definition: a person, typically a lawyer, appointed to act for another in business or legal matters.

definitions.definition: cause to come to a place or participate in a venture by offering something of interest or advantage.

definitions.definition: the action or power of evoking interest in or liking for someone or something.

definitions.definition: pleasing or appealing to the senses.

definitions.definition: respected and impressive.

definitions.definition: the sister of one's father or mother or the wife of one's uncle.

definitions.definition: into non-existence.

definitions.example: her heart beat faster with panic

definitions.definition: (of a bird) move (the wings) up and down.
definitions.example: doves wheel around the rooftops, beating their wings

definitions.definition: stir (cooking ingredients) vigorously to make a smooth or frothy mixture.
definitions.example: beat the butter until light and fluffy

definitions.definition: a main accent or rhythmic unit in music or poetry.
definitions.example: the glissando begins on the second beat

definitions.definition: the movement of a bird's wings.
definitions.example: the beat of the swallow's wings as they dive after midges

definitions.definition: a brief pause or moment of hesitation.
definitions.example: she waited for a beat of three seconds

definitions.definition: relating to the beat generation or its philosophy.
definitions.example: beat poet Allen Ginsberg

definitions.definition: an area allocated to a police officer and patrolled on foot.
definitions.example: his beat was in North London

definitions.definition: pleasing the senses or mind aesthetically.
definitions.example: beautiful poetry

definitions.definition: A person or thing that is beautiful has perfection of form, color, etc., or noble and spiritual qualities: a beautiful landscape, a beautiful woman. Handsome often implies stateliness or pleasing proportion and symmetry: a handsome man. That which is lovely is beautiful but in a warm and endearing way: a lovely smile.
good; excellent (used as a general term of approval).
a combination of qualities, such as shape, colour, or form, that pleases the aesthetic senses, especially the sight.
definitions.example: I was struck by her beauty

definitions.definition: a beautiful or pleasing thing or person, in particular:
definitions.example: a blonde beauty

definitions.definition: for the reason that; since.
definitions.example: we did it because we felt it our duty

definitions.definition: begin to be.
definitions.example: she became angry and sulked all day

definitions.definition: (of clothing) look good on or suit (someone).
definitions.example: mourning regalia became her

definitions.definition: an area of ground, typically in a garden, where flowers and plants are grown.
definitions.example: a bed of tulips

definitions.definition: a stratum or layer of rock.
definitions.example: a bed of clay

definitions.definition: a flat base or foundation on which something rests or is supported, in particular:
definitions.example: the pavement consists of granite blocks set on a bed of cement

definitions.definition: a piece of furniture for sleep or rest, typically a framework with a mattress.
definitions.example: a large double bed

definitions.definition: a room for sleeping in.
definitions.example: a two-bedroom flat

definitions.definition: the flesh of a cow, bull, or ox, used as food.
definitions.example: there was the smell of roast beef

definitions.definition: complain.
definitions.example: he was beefing about how the recession was killing the business

definitions.definition: an alcoholic drink made from yeast-fermented malt flavoured with hops.
definitions.example: a pint of beer

definitions.definition: in front of.
definitions.example: Matilda stood before her, panting

definitions.definition: in preference to; rather than.
definitions.example: a woman who placed duty before all else

definitions.definition: during the period of time preceding (a particular event or time).
definitions.example: she had to rest before dinner

definitions.definition: perform or undergo the first part of (an action or activity).
definitions.example: Peter had just begun a life sentence for murder

definitions.definition: the point in time or space at which something begins.
definitions.example: he left at the beginning of February

definitions.definition: perform or undergo the first part of (an action or activity).
definitions.example: Peter had just begun a life sentence for murder

definitions.definition: in the interests of a person, group, or principle.
definitions.example: he campaigned on behalf of the wrongly convicted four

definitions.definition: as a representative of.
definitions.example: he had to attend the funeral on Mama's behalf

definitions.definition: act or conduct oneself in a specified way, especially towards others.
definitions.example: he always behaved like a gentleman

definitions.definition: conduct oneself in accordance with the accepted norms of a society or group.
definitions.example: âJust behave, Tom,â he said

definitions.definition: at or to the far side of (something), typically so as to be hidden by it.
definitions.example: the recording machinery was kept behind screens

definitions.definition: following or further back than (another member of a moving group).
definitions.example: we were stuck behind a slow-moving tractor

definitions.definition: an acceptance that something exists or is true, especially one without proof.
definitions.example: his belief in extraterrestrial life

definitions.definition: trust, faith, or confidence in (someone or something).
definitions.example: a belief in democratic politics

definitions.definition: accept that (something) is true, especially without proof.
definitions.example: the superintendent believed Lancaster's story

definitions.definition: hold (something) as an opinion; think.
definitions.example: I believe we've already met

definitions.definition: a bell-shaped object or part, in particular:
definitions.example: a flower with small pale blue bells

definitions.definition: a hollow metal object, typically in the shape of a deep inverted cup widening at the lip, that sounds a clear musical note when struck, especially by means of a clapper inside.
definitions.example: the church bells tolled

definitions.definition: be the property of.
definitions.example: the vehicle did not belong to him

definitions.definition: at a lower level or layer than.
definitions.example: just below the pocket was a stain

definitions.definition: at a lower level or layer.
definitions.example: he jumped from the window into the moat below

definitions.definition: extending underneath.
definitions.example: the tunnel below the crags
